channel.title: How to make a server with no router and where my friends can come on
channel.description:
hi i wanna make a server with no router and where my friends can come on. But i searched for some guides and i think i find 1 this : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,77972.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,77972.0.html[/url] with title : how to make a hamachi server without router i did this but when i log into mps i fill in name and pass and then my ip then i log in and i can't :s
can sombody help me? please :)
thnx
